subject: College Athletics
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Leon Landry, Nicholas Pontiff and Micah Gibbs each hit grand slams, and Louisiana State became the ninth N.C.A.A. Division I team to hit that many in a game, beating Illinois by 22-10 in Baton Rouge. The Tigers (10-1) became the first Southeastern Conference team to accomplish the feat.
